quote: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

quote: Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.
author: Barry Finlay

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: Climb mountains not so the world can see you, but so you can see the world.
author: David McCullough Jr.

quote: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Over every mountain there is a path, although it may not be seen from the valley.
author: Theodore Roethke

quote: The higher you climb on the mountain, the harder the wind blows.
author: Sam Cummings

quote: Mountains are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
author: Anatoli Boukreev

quote: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
author: John Muir

quote: He who climbs upon the highest mountains laughs at all tragedies, real or imaginary.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Between every two pines is a doorway to a new world.
author: John Muir

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
author: William Blake

quote: When you reach the top of the mountain, keep climbing.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: The mountains are calling and I must go.
author: John Muir

quote: You are not in the mountains. The mountains are in you.
author: John Muir

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is not in reaching the summit, but in the climb itself.
author: Unknown

quote: A climb is not about conquering a mountain, it’s about conquering yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: Storms make oaks take deeper roots, and climbers stronger hearts.
author: Unknown

quote: Every peak conquered is a story of patience, pain, and persistence.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is like climbing a mountain—uncertain, challenging, and beautiful at the top.
author: Unknown

quote: Go where you feel most alive.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountains teach that not everything in the world can be conquered.
author: Unknown

quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you reach the top.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Mountains exist so we can discover something greater within ourselves.
author: Unknown

quote: May your dreams be larger than mountains and your courage higher than the highest peak.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes you just need to change your altitude.
author: Unknown

quote: Finding peace at higher elevations.
author: Unknown

quote: Mountains are the earth’s way of showing us how small we really are.
author: Unknown

quote: Every mountain inspires a new story.
author: Unknown

quote: As the altitude rises, so does my gratitude.
author: Unknown

quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, and leading to the most amazing view.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Adventure awaits where the mountains meet the sky.
author: Unknown

quote: Let’s find some beautiful place to get lost.
author: Unknown

quote: Breathe in the mountain air and exhale your worries.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is hiking in the mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: Seek those who fan your flames like mountain winds.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountain decides whether you climb or not.
author: Ed Viesturs

quote: Mountains are the punctuation marks in the great sentence of life.
author: Unknown

quote: May your heart soar as high as the mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Escape the ordinary, embrace the extraordinary mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: Climb your own Everest.
author: Unknown

quote: Life is a mountain, not a beach.
author: Unknown

quote: The climb may be tough, but the view from the top is worth it.
author: Unknown

quote: Let the mountains move you.
author: Unknown

quote: Summits are meant to be reached and dreams meant to be chased.
author: Unknown

quote: Find joy in the journey and the summit will be sweeter.
author: Unknown

quote: Higher we climb, clearer the vision.
author: Unknown

quote: Nature’s peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees.
author: John Muir

quote: Go climb a mountain, not for the world to see you, but for you to see the world.
author: Unknown

quote: The joy of reaching the top is worth every step of the climb.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountain is not in our way; it is our way.
author: Unknown

quote: On the top of mountains and beneath the stars, find your peace.
author: Unknown

quote: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

quote: Let your dreams be bigger than the mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: Find me where the mountains touch the sky.
author: Unknown

quote: Hiking more, worrying less.
author: Unknown

quote: Sky above, earth below, peace within.
author: Unknown

quote: Chasing sunsets and scaling mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: When we climb, we grow.
author: Unknown

quote: Step by step, one climbs mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: The summit is what drives us, but the climb itself is what matters.
author: Conrad Anker

quote: Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge.
author: David McCullough Jr.

quote: Getting to the top matters, but how we get there makes all the difference.
author: Jon Krakauer

quote: Mountains are like the great equalizer.
author: Jimmy Chin

quote: Climb if you will, but remember that courage and strength are nought without prudence.
author: Edward Whymper

quote: To walk in nature is to witness a thousand miracles.
author: Mary Davis

quote: May your trails be wild and your compass true.
author: Unknown

quote: Adventure awaits at every altitude.
author: Unknown

quote: The best stories are found between the pages of a passport.
author: Unknown

quote: Every mountain top is a snapshot of the next climb.
author: Unknown

quote: On the mountaintop, you see the world through different eyes.
author: Unknown

quote: Find your strength in the climb.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountain is calling, and I must answer.
author: Unknown

quote: In the mountains, I find my soul and lose my mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Mountains know secrets we need to learn.
author: Tyler Knott

quote: Mountains are the silent storytellers of our journeys.
author: Unknown

quote: Embrace the climb as much as the summit.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream higher than the sky, and deeper than the ocean.
author: Unknown

quote: May your spirit be as free as the mountain breeze.
author: Unknown

quote: Let your journey be wild and your heart be free.
author: Unknown

quote: May your peaks be high, but your soul content.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountain is a metaphor for life.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing lives long except the mountains.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: I like the mountains because they make me feel small.
author: Mark Obmascik

quote: A mountain is not like men. A mountain is sincere.
author: Unknown

quote: Nature reveals itself to those who seek it in the mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: As a mountain you can’t grow, but as a human, you can.
author: Edmund Hillary

quote: May your mountain dreams be bigger than any obstacles.
author: Unknown

quote: Every mountain begins with a single step.
author: Unknown

quote: When you reach your mountain submit, remember, there is always another.
author: Unknown

quote: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot.
author: Werner Herzog

quote: Climbing my way to serenity.
author: Unknown

quote: Nature’s majesty is revealed at higher elevations.
author: Unknown

quote: Climb mountains not so the world can see you, but so you can see the world.
author: David McCullough Jr.

quote: Hiking my way to happiness.
author: Unknown

quote: On the journey to the top, find joy in every step.
author: Unknown

quote: Elevation brings perspective.
author: Unknown

quote: May you find peace on every mountain.
author: Unknown

quote: Adventure is climbing into the unknown.
author: Unknown

quote: Every climb is a story of persistence.
author: Unknown

quote: Let the silence of the mountains teach you wisdom.
author: Unknown

quote: If you need a new perspective, climb a mountain.
author: Unknown

quote: The best views come from the hardest climbs.
author: Unknown

quote: Up in the mountains, I find my peace.
author: Unknown

quote: Every mountain has its own soul.
author: Unknown

quote: Never be afraid to climb higher.
author: Unknown

quote: Find your path, even if it leads up a mountain.
author: Unknown

quote: Live with altitude, not attitude.
author: Unknown

quote: Mountains inspire us to rise.
author: Unknown

quote: May your coffee be strong and your mountain dreams bigger.
author: Unknown

quote: The mountain teaches patience.
author: Unknown

quote: Every step up a mountain is a step in self-discovery.
author: Unknown

quote: Climb higher, see farther.
author: Unknown

quote: Go where you feel most alive—in the mountains.
author: Unknown

quote: Summits are earned, not given.
author: Unknown

quote: Rise above the clouds and find your light.
author: Unknown

quote: Mountains have a way of showing us who we really are.
author: Unknown

quote: Somewhere between the bottom of the climb and the summit is the answer to the mystery why we climb.
author: Greg Child

quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you reach the top. Then you will see how low it was.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: I like the mountains because they make me feel small. They help me sort out what's important in life.
author: Mark Obmascik

quote: The way up to the top of the mountain is always longer than you think. Don’t fool yourself, the moment will arrive when what seemed so near is still very far.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Climb the mountain not to plant your flag, but to embrace the challenge, enjoy the air and behold the view. Climb it so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
author: David McCullough Jr.

quote: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
author: Unknown

quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
author: John Muir

quote: When faced with a large project, remember you move a mountain one stone at a time.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: You have to conquer every obstacle before you can reach the top of the mountain.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Mountains are not stadiums where I satisfy my ambition to achieve; they are the cathedrals where I practice my religion.
author: Anatoli Boukreev

quote: Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
author: Hermann Buhl

quote: The greatest joy in climbing is to be in charge of one's own destiny.
author: Sir Chris Bonington

quote: The mountain offers us the scenery. It's up to us to invent the story that goes with it.
author: Nicolas Helmbacher

quote: The greatest gift of life on the mountain is time. Time to think or not think, read or not read, scribble or not scribble—to sleep and cook and walk in the woods, to sit and stare at the shapes of the hills.
author: Phillip Connors

quote: When you have walked for two hours on a mountain, you are smarter.
author: Coline Serreau

quote: The higher the mountain, the deeper the valley.
author: Alsatian Proverb

quote: Some of us are drawn to the mountains the way the moon draws the tide. Both the great forests and the mountains live in my bones. They have taught me, humbled me, purified me and changed me.
author: Joan Halifax

quote: We've climbed the mighty mountain. I see the valley below, and it's a valley of peace.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Human life is far more important than just getting to the top of a mountain.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: The Sherpas play a very important role in most mountaineering expeditions, and in fact many of them lead along the ridges and up to the summit.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: If you cannot understand that there is something in man which responds to the challenge of this mountain and goes out to meet it, that the struggle is the struggle of life itself upward and forever upward, then you won’t see why we go.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: I only went for a walk, and finally concluded to stay out till sundown, for going out, I found, was really going in.
author: John Muir

quote: There is no such thing as bad weather, only inappropriate clothing.
author: Sir Rannulph Fiennes

quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view. May your mountains rise into and above the clouds.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: In the mountains there are only two grades: You can either do it, or you can’t.
author: Rusty Baille

quote: Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory.
author: Ed Viesturs

quote: Because in the end, you won’t remember the time you spent working in the office or mowing your lawn. Climb that goddamn mountain.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: There are two kinds of climbers, those who climb because their heart sings when they’re in the mountains, and all the rest.
author: Alex Lowe

quote: Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence.
author: Hermann Buhl

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
author: William Blake

quote: Good judgment comes from experience. Experience comes from bad judgment.
author: Evan Hardin

quote: Mountain climbing is extended periods of intense boredom, interrupted by occasional moments of sheer terror.
author: Unknown

quote: When preparing to climb a mountain – pack a light heart.
author: Dan May

quote: People ask me, 'What is the use of climbing Mount Everest?' and my answer must at once be, 'It is no use.' There is not the slightest prospect of any gain whatsoever. Oh, we may learn a little about the behaviour of the human body at high altitudes, and possibly about the meteorology of Everest, but otherwise nothing will come of it. We shall not bring back a single bit of gold or silver, not a gem. The answer is: It is for the sake of the challenge.
author: George Mallory

quote: Climb if you will, but remember that courage and strength are nought without prudence, and that a momentary negligence may destroy the happiness of a lifetime.
author: Edward Whymper

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Once the travel bug bites, there is no known antidote, and I know that I shall be happily infected until the end of my life.
author: Michael Palin

quote: The mountains are calling and I must go.
author: John Muir

quote: I love the feeling of being anonymous in a city I’ve never been before.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: If we were meant to stay in one place, we'd have roots instead of feet.
author: Rachel Wolchin

quote: Traveling is not something you’re good at. It’s something you do.
author: Gayle Forman

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: I travel because I become uncomfortable being too comfortable.
author: Carew Papritz

quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Live with no excuses and travel with no regrets.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We travel not to escape life but for life not to escape us.
author: Anonymous

quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourists sees what he has come to see.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: The journey, not the arrival, matters.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
author: Aesop

quote: One’s destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
author: Henry Miller

quote: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: Travel makes one modest, you see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Take only memories, leave only footprints.
author: Chief Seattle

quote: See the world. It’s more fantastic than any dream.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and celebrate the journey.
author: Fitzhugh Mullan

quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Travel far, pay no fare… A book can take you anywhere.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: To travel is to evolve.
author: Pierre Bernardo

quote: Never hesitate to go far away, beyond all seas, all frontiers, all countries, all beliefs.
author: Amin Maalouf

quote: Oh, the places you’ll go!
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I haven’t been everywhere, but it’s on my list.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
author: Martin Buber

quote: Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center.
author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

quote: Each fresh peak ascended teaches something.
author: Sir Martin Conway

quote: May your trails be crooked, winding, and leading to the most amazing view.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: Adventure may hurt you, but monotony will kill you.
author: Unknown

quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Blessed are the curious for they shall have adventures.
author: Lovelle Drachman

quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
